tool_contract.description:
Generate a report for a IsoSeq Classify run, given both
primer-trimmed, non-chimeric, full-length reads and a
classify summary.

output_types.title: JSON file
output_types.description: Path to write report JSON output

tool_contract.name: IsoSeq Classify Report

input_types.description: Reads in FASTA format, usually are full-length, non-chimeric, primer-trimmed reads produced by IsoSeq classify.
input_types.title: Fasta reads

input_types.description: A summary produced by IsoSeq Classify, e.g. classify_summary.txt
input_types.title: Summary file
